title: Can we get the Season 5 login music?
body: Basically the thread title.  The song doesn't seem to be on the League of Legends Soundcloud, so I was wondering if it was made available through other means or simply hasn't been released in mp3 form.  If it's the latter, will it be released sometime in the future? It's such an epic piece, and seems odd that it hasn't been put on the Soundcloud.  Any info is appreciated!

replies.body: Much appreciated. <3  Keep on composing great music! :)

Why will you reply to a post like this rather than to people with real issues with your game in the help and support boards? This is a real issue for a lot of people and ive seen so many posts all day about it and no rioter will respond. But they respond to little things that don't really matter. Priority should be your customers with problems...

> [{quoted}](name=GuapoPeruviano,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=Ghc0XLUc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-29T04:37:55.399+0000)
>
> Why will you reply to a post like this rather than to people with real issues with your game in the help and support boards? This is a real issue for a lot of people and ive seen so many posts all day about it and no rioter will respond. But they respond to little things that don't really matter. Priority should be your customers with problems...

Because this rioter is a composer. So he is responding to a request about music. Weird right? Take your cynical self somewhere else pls.
